text:
Sunquest - Seattle, WA

We're hiring developers to work on healthcare software as part of our two-pizza-sized Scrum team. We are the Seattle outpost of a large company headquartered in another state. We enjoy the freedom and autonomy of a startup but also have actual benefits and financial stability. We work hard for aggressive deadlines but we also believe in work-family balance for real (half of us have kids) and we have a good gender balance on the team. Ideally you have C#/DevExpress experience, but what's more important is the ability to work collaboratively. We're all in one team room so we work closely together, literally.

To apply on the official company website: http://www.sunquestinfo.com/careers/job-opportunities (Select Jobs by Location, then Seattle)

If you have questions for the team, I'm the scrum master: jina.chan@sunquestinfo.com
